Author: jtpuente
Text: my best friend is like this.  in high school she constantly talked about how “fat” she was at 113lbs while i was 140lbs. constantly talking about her problems like failing a test or being upset at her parents while i was dealing with ED, recovering from being preyed on by a pedophile for three years, and parents so strict i would only have access to a radio.   not that everyone’s problems aren’t valid ~but~ it is aggravating
